```{r global, include=FALSE}
library(shiny)
library(metacheck)
```


```{r}
biblids::doiEntryUI(id = "dois")
emailReportUI(id = "send")
```

```{r}
# get dois
dois <- biblids::doiEntryServer(id = "dois")
# email
emailReportServer(id = "send", dois = dois())
```
